description: Man City: Does Pep Guardiola need new players?
title: Man City: Does Pep Guardiola need new players?
title_page: Man City: Does Pep Guardiola need new players? - BBC Sport
maintext:
Manchester City's pre-season tour is done and dusted, with the slightly more serious matter of the Community Shield to come against Arsenal next Sunday.
We want to know if you think anyone has forced their way into a first-team slot for the season to come? Who might step up? Or do you think Pep Guardiola needs some new faces at the club?
